alert.note: Alert for Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 7:43PM CDT until April 15 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 743 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Price Place, or 13 miles northwest of Bull Shoals, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake... Norfork Lake... Gainesville... Bakersfield... Theodosia... Pontiac... Sundown... Hardenville... Tecumseh... Isabella... Udall... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
